title: Indha Vazhkai Lyrics Amma Kanakku Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Amma Kanakku Indha Vazhkai Song Lyrics
Singers : Shashaa Tirupati
Lyrics : Palani Bharathi

Indha Vazhkaiyai
un kayyil 
edukka mudiyumaa

adhu pogum vazhiyai
maattri amaikka
mudiyumaa

adhu unakku vidhiththa
idaththai nee
arivaayo...

illai kurukkum nedukkum
alaindhu nee 
thirivaayo

kadalae nee 
.. po po po
nam vazhvai 
dheivam thandhadhaa
illai thaai vazhiyil
thaanai vandhadhaa

siru kaattrai pola
thadavai pole..
..

Indha Vazhkaiyai
un kayyil 
edukka mudiyumaa

adhu pogum vazhiyai
maattri amaikka
mudiyumaa
